<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wing Step](/Feats.aspx?ID=2655) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 137 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

With a sharp flap of your wings, you stay light on your feet as you move. You Step 5 feet twice.
name: Wing Step
